name: Let 'em Cook!
description:
In this wacky RPG adventure game, you play as a chef named Cooka 'D' Meal. He's on a mission to protect his home town from a golem who wants to destroy it! He doesn't know any cool fighting techniques, but he does know how to cook! Use the ingredients you are given in battle to cook up some MASSIVE damage! 

Arrow keys / WASD to move, Space to run, E or Z to interact, click ingredients to add them to the pan in battle!
